summary.span: 指示指定的平台或操作系统支持 API。

span.span: Indicates that an API is supported for a specified platform or operating system.

summary.span: 如果指定了版本，则无法从早期版本调用 API。

span.span: If a version is specified, the API cannot be called from an earlier version.

remarks.span: 对于不同的操作系统，可以多次应用此特性。

span.span: You can apply this attribute multiple times for different operating systems.

param.span: 应用 API 的操作系统的名称，可以选择包含版本。

span.span: The name of the operating system to which the API applies, optionally including a version.
